results.name: a(n) = A007814(n) + A209229(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: G.f.: x + Sum_{k>=1} x^(2^k)*(1 + 1/(1 - x^(2^k))). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 30 2017
xref: This is Guy Steele's sequence GS(4, 1) (see A135416).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, based on a message from Guy Steele and _Don Knuth_, Mar 01 2008
